article: Long long ago, in France, there was a king. He liked to  draw  pictures and he thought these pictures  _  good. No one liked his pictures,  _  they were afraid of him. So they said he drew very  _  . One day he showed his  _  to an honest man, and said, "How about my pictures?" To his surprise, the honest man said that they were  _  in fact. The king got  _  and put the honest man into prison. After a month the king sent his man to the honest man to tell him that he was free. When the honest man returned from  _  , the king invited him to his palace to have dinner with him. He showed him some of his new pictures again and  _  him what he thought of them. The honest man said  _  but turned back to the soldiers and said, "Put me into prison!"
